summary.para: This function creates an object that implements . This object’s implementation of ActivateObject is based on the specified IMFPMPHostApp and class ID.

param.name: pmpHost
param.para: An with the necessary information to create the IMFActivate for this app package.

param.name: objectStream
param.para: An representing the object stream that will be loaded via IMFActivate.Load.

param.name: classId
param.para: An LPCWSTR representing the target object's activatable class id.

param.name: activate
param.para: Receives a reference to the to an IMFActivate.

remarks.para: The IMFActivate can be created in a protected process and activated in an app process.
